Num.FuncTxt: local value = 0 local self = GetMyPCObject() if IsPVPField(self) == 1 then value = 1 end return value

Str.FuncTxt: local self = GetMyPCObject() if IsBuffApplied(self, "Archer_Kneelingshot") == 'YES' then return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_CAST_KNEELING" else return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_CAST" end
local self = GetMyPCObject() if IsBuffApplied(self, "Archer_Kneelingshot") == 'YES' then return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_LOOP_KNEELING" else return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_LOOP" end

Num.FuncTxt: local pc = GetMyPCObject() local sniperBuff = self:GetBuff():GetBuff("SnipersSerenity_Buff") if sniperBuff ~= nil then return 0; end local value = (4 - ((obj.Level - 1) * 0.4)); if value < 0.4 then value = 0.4; end local abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Musketeer37') if TryGetProp(abil, 'ActiveState', 0) == 1 then value = value + 1 end return value;
local value = 0; local pc = GetMyPCObject() local abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Musketeer37') if TryGetProp(abil, 'ActiveState', 0) == 1 then value = 1 end return value;

Str.FuncTxt: local self = GetMyPCObject() if IsBuffApplied(self, "Archer_Kneelingshot") == 'YES' then return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_CAST_KNEELING" else return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_CAST" end
local self = GetMyPCObject() if IsBuffApplied(self, "Archer_Kneelingshot") == 'YES' then return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_LOOP_KNEELING" else return "SKL_SNIPERSSERENITY_LOOP" end

local self = GetSkillOwner(obj); if IsBuffApplied(self, 'SnipersSerenity_Buff') == 'YES' then RemoveBuff(self, 'SnipersSerenity_Buff'); return "None"; end if IsJumping(self) == 1 then return "None"; else return "SnipersSerenity_Buff"; end

Num.FuncTxt: local value = 0; local pc = GetSkillOwner(obj); local abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Musketeer24'); if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then value = 70; local x, y, z = GetFrontPos(pc, -35); PlayEffectToGround(pc, 'I_dash001_yellow', x, y, z, 1.5, nil, nil, GetDirectionByAngle(pc)); end return value;

Str.FuncTxt: local str = "None" local abilMusketeer31 = GetAbility(self, "Musketeer31") if abilMusketeer31 ~= nil and TryGetProp(abilMusketeer31, "ActiveState") == 1 then str = "Snipe_Concealment_Buff" end return str

local str = "None" local abilMusketeer31 = GetAbility(self, "Musketeer31") if abilMusketeer31 ~= nil and TryGetProp(abilMusketeer31, "ActiveState") == 1 then str = "Snipe_Concealment_Buff" end return str
local func_name = 'get_decrease_heal_debuff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(skill, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(skill.Level)
